item.description:
Woburn Middlesex Lions present a Night of Comedy
Door open at 7 P.M.
Show starts at 7:45 P.M.

This event promises to be fun and was suggested by our member Chuck. We will not accept "Maybe" responses for this ticketed event but hope you will commit to joining us for some laughs and good company! If you respond yes you must pay Chuck for your ticket when you arrive as he will purchase them in advance and reserve tables. Thanks Chuck for doing this, paying in advance for all of us is above and beyond but a clear message about the fine people in this meetup group! ;-) If you choose to join in at the last minute (after Wed Jan 30) please come along but you will need to purchase a ticket at the door and hopefully we can squeeze you in at our tables...

Comedians:
Greg Boggis and Ric Cormier
"Back by Popular Demand"
PAUL D'ANGELO - Stand-up comedian / writer / actor & former Assistant DA & criminal-defense counsel

Cash bar with Music
and a Fun Filled Night

$20 per Person Donation
for Lions Eye Research
and Related Charities

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Comedy Night Event
